text: The 2014 AFC Women's Asian Cup was the 18th edition of the AFC Women's Asian Cup. It was won by Japan, who got their first title. == Teams == These teams automatically qualified for the tournament because they were in the top 4 of the previous tournament. The North Korea team wasn't allowed to be in the tournament because of a doping scandal in the 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup. * * * * These teams were in the tournament because they won their qualification group. * * * * == Group stage == === Group A === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Move on to 3 2 1 0 13 2 +11 7 Semi-finals and Women's World Cup 3 2 1 0 7 3 +4 7 3 1 0 2 3 7 -4 3 Fifth place play off Jordan 3 0 1 3 2 13 -11 0 === Group B === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Move on to 3 2 1 0 16 0 +16 7 Semi-finals and Women's World Cup 3 2 1 0 10 0 +10 7 3 1 0 2 2 12 -10 3 Fifth place play off 3 0 1 3 1 17 -16 0 === Fifth place play off === == Knockout stage == === Bracket === === Semi-finals === Team 1 Score Team 2 2–1 (aet) 1–2 ===Third place match=== Team 1 Score Team 2 2–1 ===Final=== Team 1 Score Team 2 1–0 == Statistics == === Top scorers === ;6 goals * Yang Li * Park Eun-sun ;3 goals * Katrina Gorry * Cho So-hyun * Jeon Ga-eul * Kanjana Sung-Ngoen ;2 goals * Kate Gill * Li Dongna * Azusa Iwashimizu * Nahomi Kawasumi * Chinatsu Kira * Emi Nakajima * Mizuho Sakaguchi * Yūki Ōgimi * Ji So-yun * Lê Thu Thanh Hương ;1 goal * Lisa De Vanna * Caitlin Foord * Elise Kellond-Knight * Li Ying * Ma Xiaoxu * Ren Guixin * Xu Yanlu * Nanase Kiryu * Homare Sawa * Stephanie Al- Naber * Maysa Jbarah * Kwon Hah-nul * Park Hee-young * Yeo Min-ji * Yoo Young-a * Yee Yee Oo * Sritala Duangnapa * Nguyễn Thị Muôn * Nguyễn Thị Tuyết Dung == References == Category:2015 FIFA Women's World Cup qualification Category:21st century in Vietnam Category:Football in Vietnam Category:2014 in Asian football Category:June 2014 events Category:July 2014 events
